thread.title: Kate Hudson Spotted Clubbing With Rumored Boyfriend Nick Jonas
thread.title_full: Kate Hudson Spotted Clubbing With Rumored Boyfriend Nick Jonas

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Kate Hudson Spotted Clubbing With Rumored Boyfriend Nick Jonas
text:
Comments Kate Hudson is seen hitting a New York club where the youngest Jonas Brother is partying. 
Kate Hudson was spotted partying at New York's Up & Down nightclub where Nick Jonas hung out. The mother of one looked stunning in a black cutaway jumpsuit with a plunging neckline. Nick, meanwhile, looked casual in a red hoodie and dark jeans. Kate and Nick are both singles. They were romantically linked after spotted on a Disney World trip together. The 36-year-old mother of two called off her engagement to baby daddy, Muse 's frontman Matthew Bellamy. The former Disney actor, now 23, split from pageant beauty, Olivia Culpo . Hudson recently explained why she broke up with Matthew. "If Matt and I had a great relationship, we would still be together, but we chose to move on because we had different visions of how we wanted to live our lives," she told Allure magazine.
